pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a fast-moving, low-angle tracking shot that glides across a desolate, reddish-brown landscape under a pink sky. The camera follows a winding dirt road where military vehicles are parked, heading towards a distant complex of white, dome-shaped buildings on the horizon. The overall scene suggests a remote military or scientific outpost at either dawn or dusk.
